original_title: Umphrey's McGee: Live From the Lake Coast Skyline Stage
overview: The first DVD release from Umphrey's McGee features excerpts from the band's two-night stand at the Skyline Stage in Chicago, on July 26 & 27, 2002. It is the only video to feature original drummer Mike Mirro, who would leave the band at the end of the year.
title: Umphrey's McGee: Live From the Lake Coast Skyline Stage
